title: Maoriland movielogues. No. 12
creator_contributor_role: New Zealand National Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/New Zealand - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/New Zealand - Social life and customs
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Forests and forestry - New Zealand
description: Cinemagazine items including: 1. Tall timbers - Kauri forest, north Auckland, shows a 1200 year old tree and a sap gatherer climbing 52 feet up. 2. Dunedin - New Zealand's Scottish city. Shows street scenes including trams and a cable car; domestic architecture and the Johnson quadruplets. 3. Ski land - action shots and ski instruction in one of New Zealand's national parks. 4. Daffodil - springtime in central Otago. 5. Fiordland - Milford Sound including Sutherland Falls and memorial to explorer Clinton MacKinnon.
